thread.title: Megan Gallen
thread.title_full: Voltaire Diamonds reviewed by Megan Gallen

author: Megan Gallen
title: Megan Gallen
text: We visited Voltaire Diamonds when looking for an engagement ring. We were delighted with the courteous and friendly service we received. We were especially impressed with the personal focus, as we were the only customers in the shop during our one hour consultation. We met with Rachel. She was lovely. She went out of her way to provide rings she thought we might like based on our descriptions. I would recommend Voltaire Diamonds and Rachel to anyone who is looking for an engagement ring or for wedding rings.
